metadata.title: Tab for TeamSeas - Home
metadata.ogTitle: Remove trash from the seas for free | Tab for #TeamSeas
metadata.ogDescription: Open browser tabs to clean our seas, for free. It's that easy. Join #teamseas today!

landing.title: The easiest way to save our seas
landing.subtitle: Every tab opened raises money for #TeamSeas, an internet-led movement raising $30 million to clean up 30 million pounds of trash from our oceans, rivers, and lakes.

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world
charityIntro.subTitle: Little actions can have big results: that is why we are supporting #TeamSeas with their goal of cleaning up 30M pounds of trash from our seas. With Tab for #TeamSeas, you can help reach this goal just by opening more browser tabs. It’s free and easy!

steps.text: Less trash in oceans and rivers

TFACIntro.title: The simplest way to make an impact
TFACIntro.subtitle: Turn your daily habits into a cleaner planet for all. Do good, feel good.
TFACIntro.img1Subtext: ##### Open new tabs on your browser.
TFACIntro.img2Subtext: ##### Earn money to clean up our oceans, rivers, and lakes.
TFACIntro.img3Subtext: ##### Help protect our planet and create a better world for all.

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText:
We all want to do our part to help out, but with limited time this can be tough to fit into our jam-packed schedules. 

 We, at Tab for #TeamSeas, believe everyone can make a difference, and that’s why we created a way to do this even if you don't have a ton of time or money. Through our partnership with #TeamSeas, you can be sure each tab you open is directly supporting [Ocean Conservancy](https://oceanconservancy.org/) and [The Ocean Cleanup](https://theoceancleanup.com/).

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab does make an impact!  Check out how much we've raised together.

Endorsements.title: People are saying good things
Endorsements.headerQuote: “It’s the quote that’s the easiest way to raise do good for cats”
Endorsements.quote: “We’ve always strived to make sure our partners are doing good by us and our furry friends. Tab for Cats is an exceptional example of what you should be looking forward to doing as a charitable organization. It’s the quote that’s the easiest way to raise do good for cats”
Endorsements.endorserTitle: Owner and founder of the Jackson Galaxy Project, Partner at Greater Good Charities

smallEndorsements.endorsement: “This is the best way for me to feel good about the things I do each day. Can’t complain, completely free, pretty unintrusive”
“This is the best way for me to feel good about the things I do each day. Can’t complain, completely free, pretty unintrusive”

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the right corner of your home screen. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It’s completely free!

questions.question: Is the new tab page as cute as this page?
questions.answer: It might be even cuter! Each day our Tabbers are welcomed with a new adorable cat photo as their background on Tab for Cats.

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for Cats support?
questions.answer: Tab for Cats supports Greater Good Charities’ The Jackson Galaxy Project. We are proud to support an incredible organization that works to train shelter cats to give them the best opportunity to be adopted.

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: Convincing your friends and family to join Tab for Cats is the most impactful thing you can do! In addition to each person raising more money, as we grow we can negotiate better rates for our ads meaning you can raise funds to help shelter cats even faster.
